      Classes in com.martinandersson.javaee.jpa.entitymanagers.lib that implement EntityManagerExposer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ContainerManagedTx
      A @Stateless bean that uses default container-managed transactions and a persistence context of default type PersistenceContextType.TRANSACTION.
      class  SingletonWithExtended
      This bean is a @Singleton EJB that try to use an entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.EXTENDED.
      class  StatefulWithExtended1
      A @Stateful EJB that uses a container-managed entity manager with extended persistence context.

      A @Stateful EJB that uses a container-managed entity manager with extended persistence context.

      A @Stateful EJB that uses a container-managed entity manager with extended persistence context.

      This bean is a @Stateless EJB that try to use an entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.EXTENDED.
      class  TransactionalWithExtended
      This bean is a @Transactional CDI bean that try to use an entity manager of type PersistenceContextType.EXTENDED.
      class  UnsynchronizedEM
      A @Stateless bean whose entity manager is of SynchronizationType UNSYNCHRONIZED.
